name: Santa Rush (Ally_Maraza)
description:
Santa is running late! Try to deliver the presents to as many houses as possible before running out. But be careful, in your rush you may hit some birds, and naughty children are out throwing snowballs at Santa trying to slow you down.

Throw presents into the chimneys of houses, and lob coal into the chimneys of naughty children's houses to get the highest score.

Made in 3 days for the Jame Gam Winter Edition.
